pillars.title: Movement
pillars.tagline: Strength and vitality in daily life

features.title: Barbell Gym
features.description: Full barbell gym setup on-site. No memberships, no commute—just walk outside and lift.

features.title: Shared Self-Driving Tesla
features.description: Community Tesla available for errands, exploring Austin, or trips to the airport. Car-free living made easy.

features.title: Hot Tub & Cold Plunge
features.description: Relax in the hot tub or invigorate yourself with a cold plunge. Recovery and wellness built into daily life.

features.title: Guest Loft
features.description: Dedicated loft space for hosting visitors. Your friends and family can stay without disrupting your housemates.

features.title: 1-5 Gbps Fiber Internet
features.description: Blazing fast fiber throughout all three houses. Work remotely, stream, or video call without interruption.

features.title: The Conservatory
features.description: A spacious glass-walled room perfect for gathering, working, music practice, or just enjoying the natural light.

features.title: Woodwork Shed
features.description: Space and tools for woodworking projects. Build furniture, art, or whatever you can imagine.

features.title: Three Houses, One Community
features.description: Like renting a mansion with three wings. 12 bedrooms, 3 kitchens, multiple living rooms, a conservatory, loft, and more than half an acre of land.

features.title: Theatre Room
features.description: Theatre-quality projector and screen for movie nights, watch parties, and karaoke sessions.

features.title: Prime Location
features.description: 3-10 minutes to downtown, Town Lake waterfront, South Congress, and East Austin by car. Easy access by bike or scooter.

features.title: Half Acre Outdoor Space
features.description: Enormous backyard with fire pits, built-in propane grill, and space to host parties. Serene, quiet, natural surroundings.

features.title: Backyard Chickens
features.description: Fresh eggs daily from our backyard flock in their mobile coop. Farm-fresh breakfast steps from your door.
